prod_short_desc: Match the Salvage M.E.C. vs. the Skulkin mech in a bounty-hunting duel!
prod_long_desc:
Stage a mech battle between bounty-hunting Ronin—assisted by Nya—against Skulkin warriors. Ronin's highly posable mech features a golden bow with a spring-loaded shooter, a net-stud shooter, a rifle, and a compartment to store stolen treasure or ammunition. The posable Skulkin mech is wielding 2 silver dark blades and there are loads of other minifigure weapons, including Krazi's Double-Bladed Skulkin Axe, to dial up the conflict. Detach the skateboard or flyer from Ronin's Salvage M.E.C. to help him escape. Includes 4 minifigures.
Build an awesome, poseable Salvage M.E.C. mech with a spring-loaded shooter, a golden bow, and an opening minifigure cockpit
Includes four minifigures featuring Ronin with special M.E.C. outfit, Nya with special Sky Bound outfit, plus Krazi and Frakjaw
Ronin's flyer measures over 1" high, 3" long and 2" wide. Skulkin mech measures over 3" high, 1" long and 1" wide
LEGO NINJAGO building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
Featured in the hit TV series LEGO NINJAGO: Masters of Spinjitzu.
439 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 8 and 14 years old
